About ZavenirZavenir is a premier manufacturer of specialty chemicals with a vision to achieve leadership position in corrosion protection and metal working fluids over the next few years. We have been serving the Indian Market with products and solutions built through our technical collaborations with Daubert and Kluthe, complemented with our own core values of Integrity, Speed, Dependability, and Innovation. The human mind and spirit are any organization's greatest resource, we do not believe any differently. Our employees are continuously motivated and developed to integrate excellence in every business process to strive for higher levels of satisfaction for customers, for the company and in their individual pursuits.  We offer a wide range of exciting career opportunities for those who seek a challenging, fast-paced, results-oriented environment where individual contributions are recognized and rewarded. Our business is growing, and we need brilliant people to keep winning. If you have a strong bias for action and enjoy working in a fast paced, innovative, and collaborative environment, then Zavenir is the place to work for you! Zavenir is an equal opportunity employer. We evaluate qualified applicants without regard to race, religion, gender, age, marital status, disability, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity, or any other characteristic protected by law.  2. Job Description: Hi, Warm Greetings! We are looking for an  Assistant or Deputy Manager - Marcom  with strong experience in  Digital Marketing.  This Opportunity for a reputed MNC Organization based at Bangalore Location. Description: The Portfolio Marketing Communications Manager is part of the global Marketing Communications team in the Business Unit Communications, Security Systems division (part of The company Group  a leading supplier of technology and services employing roughly 410,000 associates worldwide). The Marketing Communications department is a strong and dynamic in-house creative services team responsible for global marketing communications and brand management for the comapny's Communications, Sound and Audio portfolio covering the brands company, Dynacord, Electro-Voice, RTS and Telex. The diverse product portfolio includes loudspeakers, audio electronics, intercom, public address systems and more  and targets an equally broad audience from musicians to governments to stadiums. Team members are based in Europe (Germany, Netherlands, Russia, Italy, Morocco, Dubai), the US (Burnsville, Fairport), Singapore and China. The main responsibilities of this position include: This position is responsible for the marketing communications activities in India for the professional audio brand Electro-Voice (electrovoice.com), covering the portfolio of portable speakers and microphones.In addition, although to a lesser extent, the role is also responsible for installed sound portfolio for Electro-Voice (electrovoice.com) and Dynacord (dynacord.com). Due to the highly digital nature of these brands / portfolios, the role requires a strong skillset in digital channel strategy, end user targeting and content management. The ideal candidate must have a constant pulse on the market, competition and effectiveness of communications, as well as the desire to continuously search and try new tactics and reach beyond our current target audience. This is an intense and fast-moving segment with high expectations for growth. - Work closely with the local team to ensure effective exposure and impact of the brand, product portfolio, new products, promotions - Works closely with Regional MarCom to obtain effective marketing tools for their country / market(s) - Marketing Communications strategy development and execution based on the key objectives for the country - Includes new product launches as well as existing portfolio marketing - Manages local budget for creation and execution of marketing activities - Strong skillset in digital marketing a must - Skilled in optimization of online and offline communications channels using data and insights - Ensure an in-depth analysis and understanding of the target audience(s) and personas - Builds and executes end user targeting techniques to strengthen brand awareness and loyalty - Works with digital agency for execution of social media and paid advertising - A passion for music and the MI industry is a strong advantage Qualifications   Degree in Marketing or related field • 5+ years of marketing communications experience • 5+ years of digital marketing experience managing digital, event and content marketing programs • B2B experience a must   Language(s): English (mandatory), regional languages - added advantage   Additional information  B2C experience an advantage • Proven curiosity for quantitative data analysis for measuring program effectiveness, forecasting and ROI • Current certifications highly preferred (Google AdWords, Facebook Blueprint) • Strong communicator • Ability to develop and execute strategic plans • Strong time management and planning skills  Budget and finance skills • Superior communications skills, particularly in content writing and visual storytelling • Highly skilled in developing and leading presentations to internal and external audience to communicate digital campaign strategies, measurement / analytics and the steps to optimize the campaign • Ability to prioritize and execute projects against time and resource constraints • Ability to identify the appropriate communications tools and channels for the target audience • Strong understanding of online communications channels and how to use them effectively • Ability to work with global cross-functional teams • Ability to travel up to 20% annually visiting key accounts and attend conferences and events as needed If you are interested, please share your cv to  gowsalya@bvrpc.com Thanks & Regards, Gowsalya

Job Description: Project Manager - Media & Marketing Job Specification Title: Manager  Media & Marketing Manager Reports to: Head  Media & Marketing Discipline: Media  Experience: 3 years  5 years  Location: Western Suburbs, Mumbai, onsite. Job Overview: As a Project Manager for Media Marketing, you will be responsible for overseeing and executing comprehensive media marketing strategies for Projects. This role requires a combination of strategic thinking, project management skills, and a deep understanding of various media channels. The Project Manager will collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure the successful implementation of media campaigns, driving brand awareness, engagement, and ultimately achieving project objectives. Key Responsibilities: 1.  Strategy Development: Develop and implement effective media marketing strategies aligned with Project X goals and objectives. Analyze market trends, audience insights, and competitive landscape to inform strategic decision-making.  2.  Campaign Planning and Execution: Plan, coordinate, and execute integrated media campaigns across various channels, including but not limited to digital, social media, traditional advertising, and influencer partnerships. Collaborate with creative teams to develop compelling and consistent messaging across all media touchpoints. 3.  Budget Management: Develop and manage budgets for media campaigns, ensuring efficient allocation of resources to maximize ROI. Monitor and analyze campaign performance metrics to optimize spending and achieve key performance indicators (KPIs). 4.  Cross-Functional Collaboration: Work closely with internal teams, including marketing, creative, sales, and product development, to ensure seamless integration of media strategies with overall project objectives. Collaborate with external agencies and vendors to enhance media campaign effectiveness. 5.  Data Analysis and Reporting: Utilize analytics tools to measure and report on the performance of media campaigns. Provide regular reports and insights to key stakeholders, making data-driven recommendations for continuous improvement. 6.  Stay Current with Industry Trends: Stay abreast of industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices in media marketing to ensure Project X remains innovative and competitive. Qualifications: 1. Preferably Masters degree in marketing, Business, or a related field.  2. Proven experience in media marketing, with a strong track record of successful campaign management. 3. Exceptional project management skills and the ability to meet tight deadlines. 4. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with a keen attention to detail. 5. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills for effective collaboration with internal and external stakeholders. 6. Familiarity with various media channels and platforms. 7. Proficient in using analytics tools and data-driven decision-making. Preferred Skills: 1. Experience in project management tools and software. 2. Familiarity with project management methodologies. 3. Knowledge of SEO, SEM, and other digital marketing strategies. 4. Certifications in relevant areas (e.g., Google Analytics, Project Management Professional - PMP). In this Role, you’ll get to:  Work with established and highly awarded senior talents that will help you achieve your maximum potential as a creative person. We also want you to have fun, stretch all your creative muscles and do great things!  Role & responsibilities

Required Skills: Google Ads,Google Sheets,PPC,Paid Media,Google Analytics,Google AdWords,Pay Per Click,Display Advertising
Job Description: Remote Google Ads PPC Specialist When you apply, please make sure your heading/subject line reads as follows: I actually did read the instructions Who We Are : We are Digital Recipe, a team of digital professionals passionate about helping small, local and medium businesses grow their brands. We are hardcore problem-solving, custom code hacking, status-quo bucking, and out-of-the-box thinking digital chefs who design, develop, strategise, manage, optimise, and idealise. We are not only passionate about digital, but we are obsessed with it. Essentially, we are a digital marketing agency with a strong focus on search engine marketing, aiming to be the best at what we do! Were headquartered in Sydney, NSW, Australia. We have a growing team of superstars committed to working hard to ensure our clients succeed. What Were Looking For : We need an experienced mid to senior level full-time Paid PPC Google Ads Specialist! This is a remote (work-from-home) position. We are searching for a meticulous and data-driven individual to join our talented team and elevate our company and clients to the next level. Responsibilities: As a Pay Per Click Google Ads Specialist, you will play a key role in understanding Google Ads intricately and collaborating with our team to ensure seamless campaign optimisation & management.  This is a remote position where your responsibilities will focus on the technical aspects of Pay Per Click, specifically Search Engine Marketing on Google Ads search, video, and display campaigns. You will be responsible for creating, building, managing, optimising, analysing, and implementing accounts on a day-to-day basis, ensuring precision in execution, and working alongside our client manager and any relevant internal teams. You will be able to answer inquiries and troubleshoot issues. You will be able to assist in translating ad performance to clients and guide campaign strategy. Using left brain (campaign strategy and data analysis), skills makes our Paid Media PPC specialists core to our team. They are the lifeblood of our organisation, and were looking to find more wonderful team members who can help us and our clients grow! Salary & Growth Opportunities : Paid Google Ads PPC Specialist Competitive salary with progression Ability to work remotely Excellent work/life balance An extra annual leave day for your birthday You’ll work alongside a client manager to start You’ll be assigned clients slowly as we begin to build your confidence You’ll be graded on your client retention and campaign performance Once you manage a full slate (we have an algorithm to determine a full slate based on the bandwidth taken up by the types of clients on your plate), you can be promoted up to 3 tiers as a specialist. Not only is there growth as a specialist, but there is also the potential opportunity for a pathway as a Client Manager who is involved in client management, top-level account performance & strategy. The Ideal Candidate : Problem-solving : The cardinal sin at our company is asking someone a question you could have solved yourself. We need people willing to “figure it out” and not mind rolling up their sleeves. That doesn’t mean we aren’t here to support you, we are. But only when you encounter a problem that you truly can’t solve. You’re expected to bring more to the table than expected and hurdle problems, not allow them to get in your way. Initiative:  Motivated by competition and results. You are likely a skilled, pragmatic enforcer whose focus on achievement and success can help those around you accomplish goals. You speak directly and make decisions quickly. You like to explore worthwhile, practical solutions. Strategy : Your job is to learn about the client’s business and understand what they sell, who they sell to, etc. Understanding the Then, alongside the team, guides the client towards strategies that help their ad campaigns become as profitable as possible. If this means they need to change their website, it’s up to you to realise this and recommend it to them. If this means their obsession with getting a low click-through rate is hurting them because the quality of their website traffic is dropping (and consequently their conversion rates), it’s up to you to educate them on a better metric to base their campaign success on. What You Should Have: At least 2 years of full-time hands-on experience with Google Ads PPC Paid Media. Proven Google Ads track record and expertise to deliver outstanding results. High attention to detail. Keen sense of problem-solving Highly analytical and data-driven thinker. Ability to work well in a team environment and also work efficiently autonomously. Perform keyword research, strategising, implementing, budget management and optimisation for performance-focused paid campaigns. Curate performance reports and insights. Ongoing tracking towards client’s KPIs. Experience with AI & automation. Strong Microsoft Excel and Google Sheets knowledge. Conversion Tracking / Google Tag Management Experience (Not Required But Advantageous). Strong holistic understanding of Search Engine Marketing and the marketing journey. Attitude to self-develop and stay up to date with Google Ads trends Able to adhere to strict deadlines in a fast-paced environment. Strong English proficiency: Verbal and written Willing to work an AU time zone: Mon - Fri AEST Time (8 Hours + 1 Hour Break) - Flexible Start / End Time Remote working. This is a remote (work-from-home) position. Must be able to do Video Chats: Have access to a desktop, webcam, etc. All job offers start with a 90-day probation trial to ensure we’re the right fit for each other.  Our Values: Transparency:  Transparency is pivotal within our business. We don’t hide our data or sugarcoat it. Data is data, and it speaks for itself. We are honest about our work, and If it doesn’t work, we will bring it to the client’s attention. If it works, we are going to celebrate it with them. If we disagree, we say so. We are transparent & accountable. Trust:  We cut the junk, and we survive in this rapidly changing world by being experienced, authentic and fair. It's not just about doing; it's about caring. We strive to make a meaningful impact, recognising the trust placed in us to help businesses grow. We work like it matters, like what we’re doing means something. Making an impact and understanding that people rely on us to do what’s best for them. Treating our clients' businesses as our own, we work with a sense of responsibility and dedication. Flexibility:  The world has undeniably gone digital, and we along with it. Digital has become our native language – and we work fast, delivering quality, strategic thinking and efficiency within the client's budget to transform their business for the better in this digital world. We aim to automate and efficiently spend time doing what is essential for the company and clients. Results:  Strategies and decisions are determined by data. Through continued testing and optimisation, no decisions are based on whim - unless disclosed. Our results do the talking. We run tailored data-driven campaigns as we are data-driven marketers. To Apply : If you're interested, please submit the following: A link to your resume in PDF format with the following naming convention: [Lastname.Firstname.PPC-Specialist.pdf] Details of your experience as a Google Ads PPC Specialist Your answer to this question: if you were an animal, what animal would you be and why? Submissions should go to: contact@digitalrecipe.com.au and not through the job portal.  We will be looking for people who can format their submissions in a way that makes it easy for us to review. The hiring process :   90% of the applicants will not follow the instructions. None of them will be considered. We will create a shortlist for those who follow the instructions and then schedule interviews within 30 days. Submissions completed through email, as mentioned above, will have advantages over the job portal submissions. We are happy to answer any questions you may include in your application. Thank you for your consideration, and best of luck on your job search!

Job Description: Job Description Keepers of the connections we make, the CRM team comes with a great focus on knowing and identifying the right customers for our global clients. Our CRM platform, built on state-of-the-art technologies like Redshift and Matillion, is a powerful product. Driven by data and analytics, the team creates custom solutions for each client and is one of the fastest growing tribes at Epsilon India. Why we are looking for you: Rich experience delivering Digital marketing projects for multiple clients  Experience in the execution of high-complexity, multi-channel marketing programs across multiple domains/ industries like healthcare, retail, banking financial services etc. Hands-on working experience on HCL UNICA Campaign or Adobe Campaign marketing automation tools Good at understanding, analyzing, and interpreting campaign data output Experience translating business campaign strategy into business requirement document/ functional specifications, creating and executing test plans Experience managing client & internal stakeholders Experience in implementing and improving technical process adherence and quality of project by implementing engineering and quality metrics  Live by our core values every day Passion, Accountability, Global culture and Inclusion. What you will enjoy in this role: Be a part of world class organization - Contribute to creating and shaping a world class CRM Project Management organization that manages cutting edge CRM projects to help brands focus on their goals and optimize towards success. Job Description: Head-   Account   Based   Marketing Thane,   Maharashtra Huge opportunity to work within a bootstrapped, growth focused and profitable $100M+ ARR company thats expanding in the global market. Be a part of a growth start-up team that is laser focused on growth around the globe while having the backing of a self-funded enterprise base. Are you curious to analyse an emerging trend in digital marketing and translate it into actionable guidance? Do you have a desire to grow and nurture a team of passionate young achievers? If so, this is an opportunity for you to join a high-functioning team and make your mark on our organisation! The   Impact   you   will   create   in   the   Job: • Drive account specific marketing planning aligned to sales strategies for appropriate account offerings. • Engage the target audience within the account and develop an execution plan to increase  awareness, reputation and consideration for Pepiposts services and solutions. • Run the program mix (B2B Display Ads, Web Personalization, content assets etc.) highly  personalized for tier-one accounts, somewhat personalized for tier-two accounts, and  limited personalization for tier-three. • Focus on the buyers journey and deploy the right programmatic and account-specific tactical mix to deliver the right content at the right time. • Create and execute annual and quarterly marketing plans for targeted list of accounts in  order to strengthen relationships - from new customer acquisition to accelerating  opportunity close to expansion. • Build trust as an advisor to the business, challenge the status quo, and prioritize ABM programs based on strategic impact to the account. • Develop, test and optimize messages and campaigns across all channels (digital, events, etc.) • Collaborate with Marketing, Sales and creative teams to deliver collateral, web content,  emails, event messaging, strategic communications and other assets that drive customer  engagement. • Providing intent actionable insights for Sales Enablement initiatives such as fact sheets, case studies, personas, and competitor analysis. • Create framework to address requests based on unplanned Sales opportunities and business development needs, as well as real-time event-based communication needs. What   we   look   for? • 10 - 15 years of B2B SaaS/demand generation/product marketing experience with proven account-based marketing specific knowledge and skills. • Worked as an Account Based Marketer in a SaaS company. • Should have worked in both top of the funnel (lead gen with paid campaigns) and bottom of  the funnel (lead nurturing with email) • Worked on ABM platforms and CRM tools like Salesforce, Pardot, Influ2, Demand base, HubSpot etc.  Experience developing, executing, and measuring lead gen and nurture programs for B2B audience. Why   Netcore? Being first is in our nature. Netcore cloud is first and leading AI/ML-powered customer engagementand experience platform (CEE) that helps B2C brands increase engagement, conversions, revenue,and retention. Our cutting-edge SaaS products enable personalized engagement across the entire customer journey and build amazing digital experiences for business of all sizes. Our CEE platform includes 6 products  Customer Engagement, Email, Personalization, Product Experience, Customer Data platform (CDP) & Raman  our AI engine. Netcore has a perfect combo of experience as well as an agile mind. We currently work with 6500+ enterprise brands across 18 countries and serve more than 70% Unicorns in India, making us among the top-rated customer engagement & experience platform. Headquartered in Mumbai, we have our global footprints across 10+ countries worldwide including United States EU, Latin America, Australia, and Germany. Being certified as a Great Place to Work for five consecutive years only reinforces Netcores principle of being a people-centric company  whereyou will not be just an employee but a family member of the organization. A career at Netcore is more than just a job  its an opportunity to shape the future. For more information, please visit netcorecloud.com or follow us on LinkedIn. Whats   in   it   for   you? • Immense growth, continuous learning and connecting with the top-notch brands • Work with some of the most innovative brains • Medium to adopt to latest SaaS tools • Work on multiple products to keep the excitement going • Opportunity to explore your entrepreneurial mindset • Open culture where your creative bug gets activated. If this sounds like a company you would like to be a part of, and a role you would thrive in, please dont hold back from applying! We need your unique perspective for our continued innovation and success! So lets converse! Our inquisitive nature is all keen to know more about you.

Job Description: At GC, were proud to offer innovative products that meet the needs of our customers. To help us continue expanding our offerings, we’re in search of an experienced product manager to lead a multidisciplinary development team. The ideal candidate will have a keen eye for gaps in consumer product offerings and an innovative mindset for filling them as measure of enhancing customer service at GC. This person should be a highly skilled market analyst with a proven ability to strategize the full lifecycle of a product, from conception to release. A key element of this role is the effective understanding of LOS/LMS and communications systems with a keen eye on managing and improving customer experience. Role  Conduct market research and customer feedback to identify business requirements, customer pain points and opportunities for improvements.  Define product vision, strategy and roadmap for customer communications and core systems (PLF)  Communicate product strategy, goals and progress to internal and external audiences, including senior management, business, CC, operations.  Work closely with business, tech, engineering, CC, and ops teams to deliver high-quality products with quick time-to-market. Job Description: Role & responsibilities  :   Overall accountability & responsibility Collaborating with the sales team to      identify and qualify potential leads and opportunities for digital      integration solutions. Conduct initial discovery calls and      meetings with potential customers to understand their business      requirements, pain points, and digital integration needs. Working closely with internal      stakeholders, including the practice head, delivery team, and solution      architects, to design and develop custom digital integration solutions      that meet customer needs. Overseeing the implementation of digital      solutions, ensuring they are integrated smoothly and effectively with      existing systems and processes. Ensuring that digital solutions are      scalable, secure, and compliant with relevant regulations and standards. Develop detailed proposals,      presentations, and proof of concept demonstrations that clearly articulate      the benefits and value of the proposed digital integration solutions. Conducting product and solution      demonstrations for potential customers to showcase the features and      functionality of digital integration solutions. Responding to RFPs (request for      proposals) and RFIs (request for information) from potential customers      with detailed proposals and solutions. Supporting the sales team in negotiations      and closing deals by providing technical and solution expertise. Collaborating with the delivery team to      ensure successful handoff of the project from the presales phase to the      delivery phase. Keeping up-to-date with the latest      digital integration technologies, trends, and best practices to ensure      that proposals and solutions are cutting-edge and innovative. Developing and maintaining relationships      with external partners, vendors, and stakeholders involved in digital      integration projects. Analyzing data and metrics to measure digital      solutions' effectiveness and identify improvement areas. Staying up-to-date with the latest digital technologies and trends and evaluating their potential impact on the organization's operations and processes.   Knowledge & Skills : The Digital Integration Practice Head should have in-depth knowledge of digital technologies, including API integration, cloud integration, IoT integration, and data integration. He/She should also have knowledge of different programming languages, software development methodologies, and data management and analytics. He should also possess excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work collaboratively with internal and external stakeholders. Experience  The Digital Integration Practice Head should have extensive experience in digital integration, with a proven track record of successful digital transformation initiatives. He/She should have experience in managing large-scale digital integration projects, working with cross-functional teams, and providing strategic direction and guidance. Job Description: The Value Consulting team is a fast growing team of young, entrepreneurial and digital consultants that all earned their stripes at some of the best strategy firms around the globe      We are building a transformational selling strategic advisory arm at Backbase      We operate at the intersection of financial services and digital business transformation, where we help our customers ride the waves of digital transformation successfully      In a consultative and collaborative approach, you drive strategic consulting engagements with our customers - top-tier to mid-size banks and credit unions - to help address their most complex business and technological challenges      With your deep understanding of our customer s business models and your expertise in the (digital) banking domain you create a compelling long-term vision, laser-sharp financial business case and a value-driven implementation roadmap utilizing the Backbase Platform to its fullest extent      Ultimately, by directly engaging with and presenting in front of the executive teams of our customers, you accelerate decision-making and help grow the long-term relationship with our customers successfully                Meet the job          Engagement Management: You lead strategic customer engagements with top prospects and customers by delivering high impact sessions, workshops and (re-usable) materials and tools.      You maintain a high level understanding of Backbase platform capabilities to advise and inspire teams and customers;      Strategic Analysis: You take pride in a best-in-class strategic and financial analysis with top-quality deliverables.      You apply business design, management consulting and financial analysis best-practices and tools in a pragmatic approach.      You have a broad strategic mind and you thrive in a broad spectrum of both digital, financial as well as organizational challenges.      You combine empathy, creative instinct and business savvy to challenge the assumptions our customers have made about the best ways to extract value from their ecosystems;      Market Research Insights: You are always up-to-date with the latest financial services and digital banking market trends and insights. You contribute to thought leadership in Backbase through sharing your findings actively;      Consulting Tools, Content Frameworks: You work smart by creating and maintaining Backbase-specific tools, content, frameworks and best-practices to help any customer-facing function in Backbase to make an impact (e.g. Sales / Solutions Engineering / Customer Success).          How about you          You have 5+ years of work experience as a (digital) strategy consultant for one or more of the best strategy consultant firms or digital boutique consultancy firms around the globe.      Banking, payments, tech or SaaS experience is a plus. However, a can-do mentality is of more importance than many years of the perfect experience;        You are street smart and digital savvy. A true team player with a sense of humor, hands-on and self-motivated, able to drive progress and hit deadlines;        You are a well-rounded and experienced consultant with superior analytical, quantitative and conceptual thinking skills;        You have significant experience with customer-centric methods such as lean start-up, design thinking, value proposition design and agile transformation.      You know the tools and best-practices that are common in the market. Next to that, your financial analysis / ROI assessment and business case building skills are second to none;        You have significant experience in designing and optimizing banking processes and customer journeys following lean six sigma principles.        You know like nobody else what the bar is for a great and impactful consulting outcome and respective deliverables. You are passionate about creating the most impactful analyses, business cases and high-quality pitches;        You have strong interpersonal and communication skills that will ensure successful customer engagements and collaboration across multiple teams, cultures and timezones;        You have excellent English speaking, writing and presentation skills, as well as a strong ability to persuade, inspire and motivate others.      You have extensive "owning the room" experience, allowing you to naturally command the room;        You have the ability to prioritize and plan effectively with a demonstrated ability to work well under pressure and in ambiguity.      You thrive in a fast-paced environment and stay flexible and adaptable to growth and change;        You know how to spot commercial opportunities and translate these in close cooperation with sales into solid presentations, pitches and/or tailored proposals;        You naturally collaborate and generate a positive spirit of cooperation while coordinating diverse activities and groups within a team environment;        You have the courage to learn and to share your learning process with us;        You have the willingness and motivation to travel on a regular basis;

This includes working with clients to understand their business needs, developing AI solutions that address those needs, and managing the delivery of those solutions on time and within budget. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of AI technologies and a proven track record of success in delivering AI solutions to clients. The candidate will also be a strong leader and mentor, and will be able to build and manage a high-performing team of AI engineers and other professionals. If you are a highly motivated and experienced AI professional who is looking for a challenging and rewarding opportunity, we encourage you to apply.

Guiding Customers: Direct customers to the appropriate counters or sections based on their needs or interests. Assisting in Purchases: Help customers during their purchase process. Collecting Feedback: Engage with customers as they prepare to leave, asking for their feedback on their experience. This could include their thoughts on the showroom, the service, and the products. Wishing Customers: Wish customers as they leave, ensuring they depart on a positive note. This could include saying things like Have a great day! or We hope to see you again soon! Maintaining a Positive Demeanor: Maintain a friendly and approachable demeanor. Smile at customers and exhibit a positive attitude at all times. Job Description: Position Overview   We are seeking a highly experienced and skilled Senior SEO Specialist to join our dynamic marketing team. The ideal candidate is a seasoned professional with a proven track record in developing and executing successful SEO strategies.   Responsibilities:   Craft and implement SEO strategies aligned with marketing goals.   Identify high-impact keywords through thorough research.   Monitor site performance, offer data-backed recommendations.   Optimize on-page elements, enhance site structure.   Collaborate with content team for SEO-centric content.   Lead ethical off-page SEO via outreach and partnerships.   Stay updated on industry trends and algorithm changes.   Conduct website audits, collaborate with devs for fixes.   Produce insightful SEO reports, mentor junior staff.   Coordinate with cross-functional teams for strategy cohesion.   Analyze competition for differentiating opportunities.   Bring forth innovative digital marketing strategies.   Qualifications:   Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience.    years as an SEO Specialist, with proven seniority.   Proficiency in SEO tools like Google Analytics, SEMrush.   In-depth grasp of on-page, off-page, and technical SEO.   Strong analytical, communication skills.   Detail-oriented and adaptable to industry shifts.   E-commerce, local SEO experience is beneficial.   SEO certifications are a plus.   Benefits:   Competitive salary, flexible hours and many more   Collaborative, innovative work environment.           Disclaimer – Be aware of fraudulent job offers    Recruitment fraud is a sophisticated scam that offers fictitious job opportunities.   This is usually done through Audio or Video Calls, LinkedIn, WhatsApp or   Text Messages or at times through online bogus websites or unsolicited   emails claiming to be from LS Digital. These emails often request that recipients   provide personal information and, ultimately, payments to process applications,   purchase equipment, or a variety of other things for jobs that do not exist.  Please do not respond to those calls or messages as these are scamming   attempts. Please do not follow their instructions.  LS Digital does not work with any outsourced agents or encourage WFH nor do   we use any other email account than our own corporate account.  Rest assured that LS Digital and any recruitment agencies authorized to represent   us will NOT charge or collect any fees or require any money deposits from   jobseekers at any stage of the recruitment process. Anyon.ne dealing with such   unauthorized parties to seek job opportunities with us is doing so at their own   responsibility and risk.    Thank you for your cooperation.

Job Title: Multiple Openings || Growth Manager : Hirist.com : iimjobs || Delhi
Required Skills: Recruitment,Business Growth,Client Acquisition,Key Accounts,Growth Marketing,Key Account Management,Business Development,Growth Strategy
Job Description: JD: Role of a Growth Manager : Hirist.com : iimjobs | We need a Winston Wolf About the Role As part of our effort to make Hirist.com more premium, we've formed a pool of 1500 companies that we refer to as premium companies for hirist.com; of these, about 600 are not on the hirist.com platform. We'd like to approach them internally and On-board them on freemium model. Allow them to try out our product by assisting them with a few job listings. Functional Area Strategic Initiatives (Reporting to Head Strategic Initiatives) It is a high visibility role and entails working with senior leadership What you will be doing: - Lead Generation activities such as cold calling to prospects. - Maintaining and developing relationships with new & existing clients. - Responsible for Onboarding the accounts assigned. Prepare well for the demos. Take feedback from the peers. Handle objections raised by the client independently. - Cover the ground and do lot of positive re-enforcement through Webinars, Product Collaterals, Conferences and drip campaigns What are we Looking for: We are looking for sales professionals with a keen sense of ownership, drive, and desire to win. In this role, you will identify and reach out to the potential clients of hirist.com. You will need to identify and convey a compelling value proposition of the platform to the prospects and lead new customer acquisition. Work Location: Kings mall, Rohini, New Delhi, Delhi 110085 Work Days and Timings: Monday to Friday 9:30 AM 6:30 PM Saturday Sunday fixed off Work Model Hybrid (3days work from office) Who is a Growth Manager? A growth manager is someone who is responsible for driving growth for a company by identifying and implementing strategies to acquire new customers, retain existing ones, and increase revenue. Some of the key responsibilities of a growth manager include: 1. Developing and executing growth strategies: A growth manager works with cross-functional teams to identify growth opportunities and develop strategies to achieve them. They analyse market trends, customer behaviour, and competitor activity to identify new opportunities and develop a plan to capitalize on them. 2. Conducting market research: Growth managers conduct market research to understand customer needs, preferences, and behavior. This includes analyzing customer feedback, conducting surveys, and analyzing industry trends and data. 3. Analyzing and optimizing marketing campaigns: Growth managers oversee marketing campaigns and analyze their performance. They use data analysis tools to track user behavior and engagement metrics to identify opportunities to optimize campaigns and increase ROI. 4. Collaborating with product teams: Growth managers collaborate with product teams to identify and implement new product features that drive user engagement and retention. 5. Experimenting and testing: Growth managers conduct experiments and tests to validate growth hypotheses. This includes conducting A/B tests, user testing, and other experiments to identify the most effective growth strategies. 6. Monitoring and reporting on performance: Growth managers monitor and report on key performance metrics, such as user acquisition, retention, and revenue growth. They use this data to identify trends and make data-driven decisions to optimize growth strategies.

This programme offers an assured promising career pathway within Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd.  The programme is  self-financed  and candidates need to pay a fee of INR 2,80,000 to Manipal Academy of BFSI. NextGen Bankers receive a  Post Graduate Diploma in Relationship Banking  from Manipal Academy of Higher Education (MAHE) on successful completion of the programme. Candidates need to successfully complete all the following stages: Stage 1 4-month classroom course at Manipal Academy of BFSI, Bengaluru Candidates need to fulfil the academic requirements and be successful at certifications and examinations conducted by the institute Candidates need to adhere to Policies, Rules and Regulations as specified by the Institute and Kotak Mahindra Bank Candidates will receive a stipend of INR 5000 per Month during this period Stage 2 : 2-month On-the-Job Training of banking functions Candidates need to shadow various roles during the 8 weeks and submit a report to their mentor Candidates will receive a stipend of INR 10000 per Month during this period Stage 3 : 6-month internship at an allocated branch/office Candidates need to successfully complete the project assigned to them Candidates need to support their teammates for target completion Candidates will receive a stipend of INR 25000 per Month during this period     On successful completion of the 12-month programme, candidates join Kotak Mahindra Bank as  Branch Relationship Manager  and have a  CTC of INR 5 LPA(Fixed) + Performance Linked Pay . They would have the following responsibilities as BRM: Develops new and expands existing High Net worth Customer relationships for liabilities by sourcing customers. Job Description: Our Purpose Xceedance (www.xceedance.com) is a global provider of strategic consulting and managed services,  technology, data sciences and blockchain solutions to insurance organizations. Domiciled in Bermuda,  with offices in the United States, United Kingdom, Germany, Poland, India, and Australia, Xceedance  helps insurers launch new products, drive operations, implement intelligent technology, deploy advanced  analytic capabilities, and achieve business process optimization. The experienced insurance professionals  at Xceedance enable insurers, reinsurers, brokers, and program administrators worldwide to enhance  policyholder service, enter new markets, boost workflow productivity, and improve profitability.  Xceedance has achieved phenomenal growth in the past six years  a tribute to the knowledge, scope  and impact of our people around the world. Everyone is laser focused on delivering value to our  customers. We are committed to the communities in which we live and work. We are driven by a culture  of innovation and integrity. As a member of the Xceedance team, you can shape a fulfilling career, participate in exciting projects and  impact the organization in meaningful ways. Count on strong support to develop skills, grow quickly and  meet your professional aspirations. Relish working in a highly collaborative setting that features state-ofthe-art resources, modern technology and a comfortable, gratifying environment. Create solutions and  fulfill your role alongside highly talented and dynamic colleagues who will motivate you to be agile and  extremely productive. And enjoy the advantages of a superior benefits package. Our Mission and Vision The people of Xceedance are unified in the mission to offer exemplary business services and craft  market-disruptive solutions for insurance providers worldwide. As a consulting business for re/insurers, our company strives to: • Deliver solutions and services that promote growth and reinforce relationships • Emphasize attentive, value-based interactions with clients and partners • Provide seamless, consistent business experiences for all constituents • Practice the constructive change and disruption we advocate • Observe the tenets of a learning enterprise Join us if you’re looking for an opportunity to be inspired, challenged and rewarded! About the Opportunity:  The team provides standardized and streamlined back-office support to world’s leading insurers,  reinsurers, MGAs and insurance brokers. We align our goals to the client’s goals, adding value through  domain expertise and flexibility.  We support our clients in various processes like:  • Underwriting Support  • Accounting and Collections  • Policy Servicing  • Claims Management  • Marketing Analytics  The team boasts of insurance and reinsurance experts in property and casualty, professional lines,  healthcare, surety, homeowners, and various personal lines servicing clients across diverse geographies  such as the U.S., Canada, Singapore, Hong Kong, Australia and New Zealand.  Position Title: Analyst - Claims What you’ll be doing: • Support the team by processing various tasks in the claim life cycle. • Gain knowledge of commercial & personal property & casualty Insurance. • Gain knowledge of the end to end process of the Client • Analyze and input data into systems / databases • Operate process and ensure complete adherence to defined Service Level Agreements:  Productivity  Turn-around-time  Accuracy  Timely maintenance of the various work trackers What you’ll bring to the team: • Graduates • 0-1 years of P&C Insurance experience specializing in handling claims • Good written & verbal communication  • Demonstrates behaviors consistent with the organization’s values  • Analyzes and synthesizes information / Makes decisions based on policies  • Keeps the team informed on work activities  • Assumes responsibility and displays dedication to meet/exceed the expectations and  requirements of customers  • Participates as team member  • Plans tasks and organizes own work  • Sets priorities for tasks in order of importance  • Expresses positive expectations of others and speaks of team members in positive terms

Job Description: Job Overview: Thinking up great ideas and bringing them to life with the power of language. To give you a slightly more specific idea, there will be campaigns to conceptualize, headlines to be written, body copy to be crafted and presentations to be created. All with that unique touch that makes the good, great. What you'll do? (Roles & Responsibilities)  See lots of boring, conventional, typical work coming from brands and want to fight to change that  Deadlines will always be tight and you must be able to think on your feet and work fast. Also, you must have the ability to fit into a team and get along with people.  Capable of working independently and owning your own projects  Able to write beautiful, fresh, sticky copy  Know the difference between concept and execution  Good at putting together write-ups, intros, and manifestos to explain ideas  Love writing scripts and ideas for everything  Interested in working on projects for India  Able to come up with ideas totally on your own  Interested to start getting in front of clients more and owning creative presentations  Adaptable to deal with super fast and sometimes chaotic work situations  Like to experiment with social and digital channels to see what can be done  Comfortable to sometimes challenge the brief from client, account, or strategy What you'll need? (Required Skill Set)  Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience in digital advertising  1+ years' of copywriting experience in digital advertising industry  Excellent written and verbal communication skills  Highly organized with excellent attention to detail  Experience doing research using multiple sources  Excellent writing and editing skills in English  A positive attitude and goal orientated  Highly organized work style  Collaborate with design, development, and digital departments for high quality deliverables  Strong interpersonal and communication skills

Job Description: Job Role:   We are looking for a Content Strategist to manage all writing material we create for business purposes, from website content and blog articles to newsletters and social media content. Content Strategist responsibilities include creating content for different digital platforms, preparing content strategies, suggesting trending content ideas, write creative taglines, meta tags copy creation, tracking website traffic and user engagement and measuring results. Ultimately, you will ensure our web content is on brand and adds value to existing and potential customers.   Responsibilities:   Research about the brand, competition, and category and create a comprehensive content plan for the brand in line with the brand values.  Ensure consistent brand voice across all brand channels and pieces of communication.  Manage the editorial calendar to ensure timely publication on all digital channels.  Conduct keyword research and has good knowledge of SEO to better prepare content according to user and search engine need.  Monitor website traffic and user engagement (e.g. conversions and bounce rates) basis content created. Has knowledge of traffic KPIs to better understand the outcomes of content drafted and published. Write content required to manage the social media accounts. Manage posting on social media accounts (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, etc..) Can write creative ad copies required for Search Engine Ads, and Social Media Ads. Coordinate and collaborate with marketing and design teams to ensure high-quality output.  Follow industry-related news and generate ideas around trending topics.  Review and update published content as needed, identify content gaps and make recommendations accordingly. Research to come up with new content themes and ideas for content generation. Review content available on website and provide recommendations to improve the same for better user engagement and ranking on search engines. Proofread and edit. Preparing content calendars (weekly/monthly) as per the project requirement. Participate in brainstorming meetings for marketing campaigns. Key Skills:   Excellent overall writing skills in a number of different styles/tones. Impeccable spelling and grammar. Strong writing and editing skills in English (US and UK). A deep understanding of consumers and what motivates them online. You should know the user and search behavior very well. Have creative thinking and storytelling mindset Understand brand voice, USPs and target audience  Proven work experience as a Content Strategist, Content Writer, Content marketer or similar role.  A portfolio of published articles, press releases, blog and social media. Knowledge of Content Management Systems, like WordPress and Sitecore. Basic understanding of HTML and web publishing.  Familiarity with SEO copyrighting guidelines and keyword research tools (e.g. Google Keyword Planner, SEMRush, and Moz).  Experience using social media for business.  Motivation, Ability to Meet Deadlines, Ability to Work Under odd circumstances. If you have a passion for creating compelling and engaging content, and are looking for a new challenge in a dynamic and fast-paced environment, we would love to hear from you. Join our team and help us tell our story in a meaningful and impactful way.

Job Description: The candidate would be required to work as per Canadian Time Zones Pearson At Pearson, were committed to a world thats always learning and to our talented team who makes it all possible. From bringing lectures vividly to life to turning textbooks into laptop lessons, we are always reexamining the way people learn best, whether it’s one child in our own backyard or an education community across the globe. We are bold thinkers and standout innovators who motivate each other to explore new frontiers in an environment that supports and inspires us to always be better. By pushing the boundaries of technology—and each other to surpass these boundaries—we create seeds of learning that become the catalyst for the world’s innovations, personal and global, large and small. Role Description The Assistant Producer will manage the creation of digital content and online courses for Pearson’s many products and platforms. For assigned products, work with product teams to define content and course design strategies (within common program standards) that address customer feedback and market needs. Manage schedules and budgets with vendors for all assigned products to ensure that project goals, milestones, and deliverables are met on time and within budget. Work closely with supervisor and other team members to make sure all content incorporates learning design best practices and meets Pearson’s accessibility standards. The Assistant Producer’s responsibilities include the following: Manage development and      production of all media components for assigned courses, including eTexts,      videos, animations/simulations, PowerPoint lectures, and any other media      assets that support Pearson International’s list.   Within overall program      framework and standards, develop a media plan for each assigned title,      soliciting input from manager and the product team to ensure that the rich      media components of the product meet our market needs.   Collaborate with manager and      the product team to refine the structure and learning path within each      online course to highlight critical content and provide a streamlined user      experience. Work closely with manager      and other team members to ensure that all content meets Pearson’s and      accessibility standards (to align with WCAG 2.0).   Manage the assembly of the      final course build, working within Pearson systems to assemble content,      review the course with the product team, and release and deliver the final      course. Manage quality assurance for      all content in collaboration with Pearson’s dedicated QA team. Actively manage schedules      and budgets for all assigned products, monitoring and reporting regularly      on schedule, cost estimates, and actual expenditures. Obtain bids from vendors as      required; negotiate vendor contracts and manage vendor relationships,      actively monitoring for quality compliance and adherence to schedule,      budget, and technical specifications. Qualifications Related work experience Minimum of 2-4 years      managing digital content for educational courseware Experience managing      freelancers, vendors, and/or authors Experience managing digital      workflows Proven track record of working      independently within cross-functional teams Formal Education or Equivalent Bachelor’s degree or      equivalent required   Critical Competencies and Skills Ability to work      independently and thrive in an environment of continual change Highly effective      communication skills, including the ability to facilitate communication,      build consensus among team members, and make decisions confidently Excellent project management      skills, including the ability to multi-task and effectively balance      short-term and long-term priorities, making appropriate calls on      prioritization Exceptional attention to      detail and strong organization skills: self-organizing and self-motivating Ability to respond      confidently to conflicts and manage situations in a positive way,      proactively escalating on-going issues to manager Ability to take active      ownership of projects, proactively assessing and mitigating risk and      posing effective solutions to problems Basic knowledge of      HTML/JavaScript/CSS is preferred Knowledge of Smartsheets or      equivalent project management tools is a plus Knowledge of video      compression software & general video production techniques is a plus

Job Description: Job Description : Associate Creative Director   Who we are We are Windowseat. We are more than a BRAND DESIGN & Advertising Agency. We believe that we are designers creating purposeful work that has clear and measurable outcomes for our clients. Dont be surprised if you find us developing our own products and taking it to market.    We are strategic first - Today your brand is not a message, its not an ad, its not a social media post. Its a story evolving across multiple touch points. We are creative led - We bring an unbiased approach to finding the right answer. Trust us to push you on a brave new creative path.    We make meaning - Successful brands will find ways to build relationship that go beyond the transactional into human truths to believe, belong and find meaning. We work with our clients to bridge this new frontier in brand marketing where you dont just aspire for a position in the market, but create meaning.   Finally we like Windowgazing Out here its fine to be caught Windowgazing. This is a philosophy, an approach and a way of life for us. In simple terms its your ability to simple gaze into the mundane and routine long enough to stumble upon things that no one noticed.   Who we want Associate Creative Director   Windowseat is looking for a tenured and experienced Associate Creative Director who will play a critical role in our growth journey. The incumbent will work closely with the Creative Director and also on individual projects to develop concepts, briefs and strategic insights into creative solutions. The incumbent will be managing a lean and high performing team of art, copy and video.    Role and responsibility Supporting the Executive Creative Director with the development of concepts, strategies, and client presentations. Lead projects completely from concept to execution on various brands Managing and supervising multiple projects and teams. Bring an ability to think and understand copy Ensuring resources are allocated according to project needs. Directing the design and development of creative materials. Ensuring brand identity and message consistency across channels. Meeting client objectives, values, budgets, and deadlines. Leading and participating in brainstorming sessions. Keeping up with the latest trends, strategies, and technologies. Evaluating creative team performance and guiding improvements.   Desired Candidate Profile 8-12 years experience with 4-5 years in a relevant role of Art director or Sr. Art director Must be a BFA or BDes Graduate at least. Illustrative skills along with knowledge of Adobe illustrator and photoshop is critical. Experience across Brand Design, Typography will be of great advantage.  Understanding of FMCG, Retail, QSR will be a definite good to have. Should have proven experience of running successful campaigns across multiple media channels Ability to nurture and build innovative thinking culture in the organisation Ability to think and understand copy Proven experience of having worked with copywriters and other production departments. Ability to work with multiple stakeholders within the organisation and also with clients.        For more on the company log on to www.windowseat.agency

Job Description: Company: Compunnel INC. Job Title: Senior Technical Content Writer Experience Required: 5+ Years    Job Location: Noida Sec - 58 Mode of Work: Work from Office Shift Timings: 11:00 AM To 8:00 PM IST  Overview:   We are seeking a talented Technical Content Writer to join our team and contribute to creating high-quality, engaging, and informative content. The ideal candidate will have a strong technical background, exceptional writing skills, and the ability to communicate complex information in a clear and accessible manner. Responsibilities:   1. Content Creation:  Produce well-researched, accurate, and insightful technical content, including articles, blog posts, whitepapers, case studies, and documentation. 2. Research and Analysis:  Conduct in-depth research on industry-related topics, technologies, and trends to produce content that is both current and valuable to our audience. 3. Collaboration:  Work closely with subject matter experts, developers, and other teams to gather information and ensure content accuracy. 4. Content Optimization:  Optimize content for SEO, ensuring it aligns with keyword strategies and best practices to enhance visibility and reach. 5. Content Strategy:  Contribute to content planning and strategy discussions, providing insights and ideas for new topics and formats. 6. Editing and Proofreading : Review and edit content for clarity, accuracy, grammar, and style consistency. 7. Documentation:  Create technical documentation, guides, and manuals that are user-friendly and easy to understand. Exceptional writing and editing skills with a keen eye for detail.  Ability to translate complex technical concepts into clear and concise content.  Strong research skills and the capacity to comprehend and explain intricate technical information.  Familiarity with SEO principles and content optimization techniques.  Proficiency in content management systems and tools.  Excellent time management and organizational abilities.  Experience in software development, IT, or a tech-related field (preferred). Required Skills: Content Writing,Content Strategy,Content Creation,Social Media,Content Planning,keyword,Media,Strategist
Job Description: Job Role:   We are looking for a Content Strategist to manage all writing material we create for business purposes, from website content and blog articles to newsletters and social media content. Content Strategist responsibilities include creating content for different digital platforms, preparing content strategies, suggesting trending content ideas, write creative taglines, meta tags copy creation, tracking website traffic and user engagement and measuring results. Ultimately, you will ensure our web content is on brand and adds value to existing and potential customers.   Responsibilities:   Research about the brand, competition, and category and create a comprehensive content plan for the brand in line with the brand values.  Ensure consistent brand voice across all brand channels and pieces of communication.  Manage the editorial calendar to ensure timely publication on all digital channels.  Conduct keyword research and has good knowledge of SEO to better prepare content according to user and search engine need.  Monitor website traffic and user engagement (e.g. conversions and bounce rates) basis content created. Has knowledge of traffic KPIs to better understand the outcomes of content drafted and published. Write content required to manage the social media accounts. Manage posting on social media accounts (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, etc..) Can write creative ad copies required for Search Engine Ads, and Social Media Ads. Coordinate and collaborate with marketing and design teams to ensure high-quality output.  Follow industry-related news and generate ideas around trending topics.  Review and update published content as needed, identify content gaps and make recommendations accordingly. Research to come up with new content themes and ideas for content generation. Review content available on website and provide recommendations to improve the same for better user engagement and ranking on search engines. Proofread and edit. Preparing content calendars (weekly/monthly) as per the project requirement. Participate in brainstorming meetings for marketing campaigns. Key Skills:   Excellent overall writing skills in a number of different styles/tones. Impeccable spelling and grammar. Strong writing and editing skills in English (US and UK). A deep understanding of consumers and what motivates them online. You should know the user and search behavior very well. Have creative thinking and storytelling mindset Understand brand voice, USPs and target audience  Proven work experience as a Content Strategist, Content Writer, Content marketer or similar role.  A portfolio of published articles, press releases, blog and social media. Knowledge of Content Management Systems, like WordPress and Sitecore. Basic understanding of HTML and web publishing.  Familiarity with SEO copyrighting guidelines and keyword research tools (e.g. Google Keyword Planner, SEMRush, and Moz).  Experience using social media for business.  Motivation, Ability to Meet Deadlines, Ability to Work Under odd circumstances. If you have a passion for creating compelling and engaging content, and are looking for a new challenge in a dynamic and fast-paced environment, we would love to hear from you. Join our team and help us tell our story in a meaningful and impactful way.

Required Skills: Creative Writing,Creativity,Time Management,copy writing,Proof Reading,Research,Management,Time
Job Description: Job Overview: Thinking up great ideas and bringing them to life with the power of language. To give you a slightly more specific idea, there will be campaigns to conceptualize, headlines to be written, body copy to be crafted and presentations to be created. All with that unique touch that makes the good, great. What you'll do? (Roles & Responsibilities)  See lots of boring, conventional, typical work coming from brands and want to fight to change that  Deadlines will always be tight and you must be able to think on your feet and work fast. Also, you must have the ability to fit into a team and get along with people.  Capable of working independently and owning your own projects  Able to write beautiful, fresh, sticky copy  Know the difference between concept and execution  Good at putting together write-ups, intros, and manifestos to explain ideas  Love writing scripts and ideas for everything  Interested in working on projects for India  Able to come up with ideas totally on your own  Interested to start getting in front of clients more and owning creative presentations  Adaptable to deal with super fast and sometimes chaotic work situations  Like to experiment with social and digital channels to see what can be done  Comfortable to sometimes challenge the brief from client, account, or strategy What you'll need? (Required Skill Set)  Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience in digital advertising  1+ years' of copywriting experience in digital advertising industry  Excellent written and verbal communication skills  Highly organized with excellent attention to detail  Experience doing research using multiple sources  Excellent writing and editing skills in English  A positive attitude and goal orientated  Highly organized work style  Collaborate with design, development, and digital departments for high quality deliverables  Strong interpersonal and communication skills

Preferred candidate profile     Minimum of 5 years’ experience in funnel building, analysis, and troubleshooting Proficient with funnel building platforms such as Active Campaign, Click funnels, Kajabi, Lead Pages, WordPress Page Builder Plugins, etc Conversion Rate Optimization experience Ability to perform split tests and determine which portions of the funnel need optimization An understanding of different funnel types and when to use them for most effectiveness Experience with Funnel Content Creations (Lead Magnets, Webinar Scripts, etc.)  Use transcripts to ghost write Perks and benefits

Key Responsibilities:   Content Writing : Develop and produce high-quality,      informative, and interesting written content for different platforms      including websites, blogs, social media, and marketing materials.  Graphic Design : Design visually appealing graphics for      various marketing campaigns, including digital advertisements, brochures,      presentations, and social media posts.  Video Creation   (a plus, not mandatory) : Ability      to create and edit videos is a valuable bonus, enhancing the storytelling      aspect of our marketing efforts.  Collaborative Brainstorming : Actively participate in brainstorming      sessions with the marketing team to suggest innovative content and      marketing ideas.  Brand Consistency:  Ensure all content and designs align      with our brands voice, style, and messaging guidelines.  Market Research:  Stay updated with the latest trends in      content writing and graphic design and incorporate these trends into      your work to keep our brand fresh and relevant.  Feedback Implementation:  Incorporate feedback from the marketing      manager and other team members to refine content and design. Job Description: Position Overview   We are seeking a highly experienced and skilled Senior SEO Specialist to join our dynamic marketing team. Responsibilities:   Craft and implement SEO strategies aligned with marketing goals.   Identify high-impact keywords through thorough research.   Monitor site performance, offer data-backed recommendations.   Optimize on-page elements, enhance site structure.   Collaborate with content team for SEO-centric content. Bring forth innovative digital marketing strategies.   Qualifications:   Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience.    years as an SEO Specialist, with proven seniority. Job Description: Job Role:   We are looking for a Content Strategist to manage all writing material we create for business purposes, from website content and blog articles to newsletters and social media content. Content Strategist responsibilities include creating content for different digital platforms, preparing content strategies, suggesting trending content ideas, write creative taglines, meta tags copy creation, tracking website traffic and user engagement and measuring results. Ultimately, you will ensure our web content is on brand and adds value to existing and potential customers.   Responsibilities:   Research about the brand, competition, and category and create a comprehensive content plan for the brand in line with the brand values.  Ensure consistent brand voice across all brand channels and pieces of communication.  Manage the editorial calendar to ensure timely publication on all digital channels.  Conduct keyword research and has good knowledge of SEO to better prepare content according to user and search engine need.  Monitor website traffic and user engagement (e.g. conversions and bounce rates) basis content created. Has knowledge of traffic KPIs to better understand the outcomes of content drafted and published. Write content required to manage the social media accounts. Manage posting on social media accounts (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, etc..) Can write creative ad copies required for Search Engine Ads, and Social Media Ads. Coordinate and collaborate with marketing and design teams to ensure high-quality output.  Follow industry-related news and generate ideas around trending topics.  Review and update published content as needed, identify content gaps and make recommendations accordingly. Research to come up with new content themes and ideas for content generation. Review content available on website and provide recommendations to improve the same for better user engagement and ranking on search engines. Proofread and edit. Preparing content calendars (weekly/monthly) as per the project requirement. Participate in brainstorming meetings for marketing campaigns. Key Skills:   Excellent overall writing skills in a number of different styles/tones. Impeccable spelling and grammar. Strong writing and editing skills in English (US and UK). A deep understanding of consumers and what motivates them online. You should know the user and search behavior very well. Have creative thinking and storytelling mindset Understand brand voice, USPs and target audience  Proven work experience as a Content Strategist, Content Writer, Content marketer or similar role.  A portfolio of published articles, press releases, blog and social media. Knowledge of Content Management Systems, like WordPress and Sitecore. Basic understanding of HTML and web publishing.  Familiarity with SEO copyrighting guidelines and keyword research tools (e.g. Google Keyword Planner, SEMRush, and Moz).  Experience using social media for business.  Motivation, Ability to Meet Deadlines, Ability to Work Under odd circumstances. If you have a passion for creating compelling and engaging content, and are looking for a new challenge in a dynamic and fast-paced environment, we would love to hear from you. Join our team and help us tell our story in a meaningful and impactful way.

Bachelors degree or equivalent experience in a relevant field         Overall 10+ Years of Professional Experience         Minimum experience of 5+ years with progressive responsibilities in Software Engineering - Pega DPA and PEGA PRPC (Pega Rules Process Commander), Architecture and Agile Framework.         2+ Years of Experience in Software development with Agile software methodologies (Scrum, eXtreme Programming, Kanban, etc)         2+ Years of Experience in defining solution and leading and directing team on technologies.         Must be able to operationalize and assist teams with abstract technology concepts.         Strong demonstrated competencies on cloud and digital platforms.         Strong communication, collaborative, and influencing skills.         Proven ability to work closely with senior leadership.         Strong personal presence and capabilities to resolve technical concerns.         Experience with cloud services and platform knowledge.         Demonstrated ability to drive development of highly technical technology services and capabilities.         Experience with Lean methodology eXtreme Programming.         Demonstrated understanding and ability to drive API economy and solutions.         Demonstrated understanding and ability to drive highly available consumer ready Internet properties and technical platforms.         Experience collaborating with engineers, designers, and product owners.         Excellent communication skills with the ability to adapt your communication style to the audience.         Ability to work collaboratively and navigate complex decision making in a rapidly changing environment.         Strong leadership and communication skills and the ability to teach others.             Even better, you may have...             Technical expert who has experience building platforms and underlying services for re-use.         Understands business priorities and technical feasibility to prioritize the platform backlog, identify dependencies, and manage risks.         Ability to jump in and assist product lines and product teams to resolve technical blockers.         Focus on delivering product value through reusable services and technologies that other product teams can leverage.         Initiates or translates the product road map into manageable product features in the backlog through quarterly scoping sessions.         Work hands-on with the product teams to prioritize, plan, and deliver the platform foundations capabilities.         Attends FCSD Technology councils and cascades relevant information to appropriate members of their product line.         Identifies areas within software delivery process and application ecosystem that require cohesion across the platform and addresses them through common engineering policies.         Assess the technology feasibility of the product group roadmaps.         Employs and/or champions Agile software processes, culture, best practices, and techniques.         Actively works to identify and remove/ mitigate risks and blockers to product delivery.         Assesses the overall health of the product and prompts key decisions to move it forward.       You may not check every box, or your experience may look a little different from what weve outlined, but if you think you can bring value to Ford Motor Company, we encourage you to apply!             Ensures software engineering excellence (eg best practices and quality) is achieved within the product line.         Collaborates with other Product Line Anchors to reduce complexity across the portfolio, enhance interoperability between services, and make key design decisions across the portfolio.         Provide thought leadership for the development, structure, technology, and tools used within FCSD.         Innovate and operate with an iterative, agile and user-centric perspective.         Clearly communicate technology strategy and vision to team members and internal and external stakeholders.         Demonstrate software engineering excellence through actively coding, pairing, and performing code and architecture reviews with the software engineers within the product line. Certified in PEGA PRPC (Pega Rules Process Commander) Pega CSA/CSSA (must) / LSA - Part 01 (nice to have)         Played LSA/Senior Develop role for at least few projects with a minimum team size of 4         Complete working knowledge in Case Management, Access Group, Work Queue and Access Role         Complete knowledge in Working on Complex flows such as Split Join, Spin Off and Pega s Debugging tools         Ensures technical, functional, performance and business requirements as well as best practices as defined by the team/organization/industry         Has an advanced working experience PEGA PRPC V7.x/8.x tools and leads development activities         Exposure to Pega SaaS will be an added advantage          Ability to Translate business requirements into technical design/application builds         Experience in developing Bug free quality code which maintain 90-97 Guardrail score.         Experience in API based development (Connect/Service APIs)         Experience in Developing Dynamic UI controls.         Mentors team members for ensuring smooth development         Experience in creating High level design and low-level design documentation         Experience in reviewing code of other team members and peers         Ability to debug complex issues/bugs         Maintaining security of application         Coordinating with the project team to ensure the business architecture matches the needs of the customer.
